body:
In the past, I wasn't really sure which variants should default to True or False. It looks like all of the deep learning AMI's on AWS come "configured with NVIDIA CUDA, cuDNN, NCCL, Intel MKL-DNN", so I decided those are likely the most important features.

* CUDA - needed to run on a GPU
* cuDNN - GPU-accelerated library of primitives for deep neural networks
* NCCL - needed for distributed GPU training
* MKL-DNN - optimized for Intel hardware
title: Update default PyTorch variants
